summary: Transform into Ichigo\'s second hollow form.
descriptionHtml:
Thanks for 400 endorsements :DDD

***If it does not work for you, Update to skyrim 1.8 or later***

IF YOU UPDATE THE MOD OR UNINSTALL-
Make sure you are not transformed in your current save game.

Quick Demos/Reviews
[youtube]PtinOO4Q1rQ[/youtube]     [youtube]yOiYtmdBWcw[/youtube]
[youtube]KNOF0AnAD34[/youtube]    [youtube]v22XxsowwX8[/youtube] 
[youtube]NglfcYuJgUA[/youtube]    [youtube]dAS52Buu4iI[/youtube]


Description-
This mod will allow you to transform into Ichigo\'s Vasto Lorde form. When you transform it will play an animation if you have your weapon sheathed. While transformed you will be much stronger, but suffer a constant drain on your magic then your stamina, once you run out of stamina you will turn back to normal. While transformed You will get a cero spell, It is a voice power. If you want to transform back without waiting for your stamina to drain, you will also receive a Revert form spell that will turn you back to normal.

This mod may be a little over or under powered, so I am including a few different transformations of varying power, so you can choose based on your mods and play-style. The different spells will range from novice to master then ultra, and then \"OP\" for those who just want to feel godlike.

This mod includes custom sound effects, textures, and a hand sculpted mesh that roughly matches the original body poly count, so you should not experience any performance issues with it.

To get the spells buy them from Belethor in Belethor\'s General Goods in Whiterun.

To properly play as Vasto Lorde, you should have Zangetsu :P so If you haven\'t already check out my other mod http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24627

Installation- 
Drag all the files and the esp Files in your data folder
check the esp in the Skyrim launcher

Uninstall- 
***Make sure you have a save where you are not transformed!***
Delete all of the included files.

Troubleshooting-
If you use the mod Crimson Tide You will get VERY bloody.

If you run into any problems, make sure you have the latest version of Skyrim and my mod, then tell me, and I will try to fix it immediately.

Permissions-
If you want to use any of my meshes you must ask me first.

Thanks-
Number one, I would like to thank BlackRorono, Without him, this mod would not at all be possible, I just made the model, He skinned it, put it into the game, and wrote the transformation script for me.
BlackRorono does some cool mods, here is a link to his YouTube channel. http://www.youtube.com/user/R0R0N0
I would also like to thank Gyn, creator of the Naruto Anime Overhaul for helping me with some scripting and conceptual ideas.
Here is his mod http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15699
And I would like to thank my brother for doing the bulk of the scripting... he is one awesome panda :)
author: BattleyaxStudios
